alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Knox; Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 02 at 9:15PM EST until January 11 at 6:09AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at Mount Carmel. .Antecedent soil moisture...and upwards of two inches of rainfall this past weekend over central Indiana...has brought the Wabash River to flood. Minor flooding is expected at Mount Carmel through early next week. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY, JANUARY 11... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Mount Carmel. * WHEN...From late tonight to Tuesday, January 11. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, River Road in the Mount Carmel, Illinois area begins to flood. Lowland flooding in progress. A few local river roads are closed by high water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Sunday /7:45 PM EST Sunday/ the stage was 18.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 21.4 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday, January 10. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued by noon Monday.
